Text: thanks bud. for all the shows..

CT
Is there a way I can just get game 4? 11.88GB is a lot to download just to watch one game.
Yes. You can easily select only the 4th game of this torrent from your torrent client (uTorrent, BitComet, Azureus etc.)
I tried that, it didn't give me the option. I have uTorrent and I think it stopped giving that option since I upgraded it. *shrug* Oh, well, I only have another 23 hrs til the download ends.

You still have that option. Because of the magnetic link it doesn't appear in the first place. You have to wait a little while then select file (above) and select the files you don't want it, then click right and select the "don't download" option. That's it!
